refnamediv.refpurpose: An e-book manager application for GNOME

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: gnome-books is an e-book manager application designed to work with GNOME 3. You can view your local e-books, search through them, print or mark them as favorites.

refsect1.title: Bugs
refsect1.para: The bug tracker can be reached by visiting the website https://bugzilla.gnome.org/buglist.cgi?product=gnome-documents&component=books. Before sending a bug report, please verify that you have the latest version of gnome-books. Many bugs (major and minor) are fixed at each release, and if yours is out of date, the problem may already have been solved.

refsect1.title: Additional Information
refsect1.para: For further information, visit the website https://wiki.gnome.org/Apps/Books.
